<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all the user report files.

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Report files","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"File name"},"UpdatedBy":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"},"Updated":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-08T17:37:03.3424957Z"},"Location":{"type":"string","example":"4\\\\46\\\\File name"}},"title":"FileWrapper"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
